description: ALTERATIONS TO AND CHANGE OF USE OF PREMISES FROM A CONVENT TO AN ELDERLY PERSONS HOME AND HOSPICE INVOLVING THE ERECTION OF A SECOND FLOOR ADDITION OVER EXISTING REAR EXTENSION AND CONSTRUCTION OF A NEW 3 STOREY INFILL BLOCK TO REPLACE EXISTING COTTAGE SECTION OF PREMISES PLUS PROVISION OF ADDITIONAL PARKING AND NEW ACCESS OFF LANSDOWNE ROAD.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The door(s) of the garage hereby permitted shall not open over or encroach in any way on the highway, or shared accessway.
Condition : 3 - Details of the materials to be used for external surfaces of the building/extension shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority before any work is commenced.

Condition : 4 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the exten elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and fixed shut and shall be maintained as such thereafter.
site_name: St Teresas Home For The Elderly
